title: Total global visitor traffic to Groupon.com 2019
yAxis: Number of unique visitors in millions
summary: The Total global Month in the traffic Groupon.com was Month Aug_'19 , who made 54.2 unique .
The most global Month was Jun_'19 , with just 42.5 unique .

In second place was Month Sep_'19 with 42.5 unique ; third place went to Month Oct_'19 with 43.4 unique ; fourth place went to Month May_'19 with 52.9 unique and fifth place went to Month Jul_'19 , who was 54.1 unique .
gold: This statistic shows the unique monthly visitors to social couponing site Groupon from May 2019 to October 2019 . During the last measured month , almost 43.4 million unique global visitors had visited Groupon , down from 52.9 million visitors in May 2019 .
